tossup_question: -   –  Coral polyps extract what compound out of seawater to form hard external skeletons?
bonus_question: -   –  Trees growing on the edge of a river’s meander are most likely to fall into the river due to:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Deposition on the inside of the meander
X) Deposition on the outside of the meander
Y) Erosion on the inside of the meander
Z) Erosion on the outside of the meander
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) EROSION ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE MEANDER
